AD_TABLE.NAME: obcosta_costing_transactions
AD_TABLE.HQLQUERY: select trx.id, trx.movementType, trx as transaction, trx.movementDate, trx.transactionProcessDate as trxProcessDate, c.id as costingId, trx.movementQuantity, case when trx.movementQuantity > 0 then (trx.transactionCost / trx.movementQuantity) else ((trx.transactionCost / trx.movementQuantity)*(-1)) end as price, case when trx.movementQuantity > 0 then trx.transactionCost else ((trx.transactionCost)*(-1)) end as transactionCost, @cumQty@ as cumQty, case when trxcosting.id = trx.id then c.cost else @previousCostingCost@ end as cost, @cumCost@ as cumCost, coalesce((select sum(cost) from TransactionCost where inventoryTransaction.id = trx.id and costAdjustmentLine !=null), 0) as adjustmentAmt from MaterialMgmtCosting as c join c.inventoryTransaction as trxcosting, MaterialMgmtMaterialTransaction trx join trx.storageBin as locator, ADList as trxtype where @whereClause@
